instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
threads.message:
the board has no water damage it came in with bad screen and no sound i change screen but no sound it says no audio found 
u6200
 pp1v8_so 1.8v
HDA_SDOUT 0V
HDA_RST_L 0V
HDA_SYNC 0V

threads.title: 820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
threads.message: Check all the resistors and traces between PCH and audio codec (HDA bus),

threads.title: 820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
threads.message:
The diode measurement on the HDA lines was around
HDA_SDOUT .886
HDA_RST_L    .916
HDA_SYNC    .916
HDA_BIT_CLK .903
8409_HDA_SDINO_R .840

threads.title: 820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
threads.message: I meant to check the value of the 33 ohm resistors placed between PCH and audio codec; like R1300/01, etc...

threads.title: 820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
threads.message:
HDA_SDOUT R1302  = .886
HDA_RST_L    R1303 = .916 
HDA_SYNC     R1300 = .916
HDA_BIT_CLK R1301 = .903
8409_HDA_SDINO_R   R6203 = .840

threads.title: 820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
threads.message:
I can't believe...
Can you check if all mentioned resistors have 33 ohm and good traces continuity???
I never asked to check diode mode to ground!

threads.title: 820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
threads.message:
HDA_SDOUT R1302 = 35 ohm
HDA_RST_L R1303 = 35
HDA_SYNC R1300 = 35
HDA_BIT_CLK R1301 = 35
8409_HDA_SDINO_R R6203 = 35
all the traces i can see look ok

threads.message: can you recommend where to get them

threads.title: 820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
threads.message: I Tried another audio codec. still nothing

threads.title: 820-00923 No audio device. everything else works
threads.message:
Possibly broken traces, or knocked off components.
Or even PCH internal problem...
